node.title: Dogs and Gut Health
node.introduction: If you have a dog, ask yourself this question. Why did you make the decision to get him or her?

node.text:
Dogs & Gut Health üê∂ They really are a man's best friend! 
Find out your dog's secret talent and how they can help your immune system in my latest blog post. Link in bio
#pomeranian #lovemydog #guthealthmatters #immunesystembooster #mansbestfriend #dogslife #glutenfree #dairyfree #petsofinstagram #pomeranianlove #microbiomehealth #gutmicrobiomediversity #microbiomediversity #boostyourimmunity #goodbacteria

Friday Feast!! It's almost the weekend which means an early finish and a delicious dinner!üòé We all know that eating as much fruit & veg as possible is a good thing but it's not just about portions it's also about diversity.
This means as many colours and types of fruit & vegetables as possible. Our Friday Feast has a whopping 16 different types. So I'd say pretty diverse and definitely covers eating the rainbow! 
#plantpower #glutenfree #dairyfree #plantbased #guthealthmatters #microbiomediet #thegutmicrobiome #eathealthyfood #eattherainbow #eattherainbowüåà #rebalance #superfoods #fridayfeasting #fridayfeasting #itstheweekendbaby #fiveaday #glutenfreeeats

The power of three! üç´üçåüå¥
I finally got around to making these little beauties! Thanks to my bro @bj_vegan for the inspiration üôè
They could not be easier to make and are a great snack or treat anytime of the day! 
Ingredients:
1 large ripe banana 
Desicated coconut (enough to get the consistency right for shaping)
30g dark chocolate.
Method
1. Mash the banana, add the desicated coconut mix until you get a manageable consistency.
2. Break the chocolate up into small pieces add to the banana mixture.
3. Shape into small balls. Place on a lined baking sheet then flatten a little. 
4. Bake at 180 for 15 minutes.
Enjoy with a lovely cuppa! üòä 
#dairyfree #glutenfreeeats #glutenfreeeats #vegan #veganrecipes #plantbased #plantpower #plantpower #nutritionaltherapy #rebalancingyou #powerofthreewillsetusfree #powerofthree
#snackattacks #munchies #healthylifestyle #healthychoices #grainfreevegan #grainfreeliving

Watermelon lowdown üçâ
It's mostly water. At around 90% you can see why it's super refreshing! But it does contain some useful nutrients!
It's a good source of vitamin C an antioxidant essential for skin health and immune function. It also has small amounts of the minerals copper and potassium and contains beta carotene which our bodies turn into vitamin A
It's also a good dietary source of citrulline and lycopene, two powerful plant compounds. 
Most of all it makes me smile and reminds me of being a kid growing up in South Africa! üáøüá¶üòé
#southafrica #watermelonjunkie #glutenfreeeats #fakeaway #plantbased #plantpower #summernails #nutritionaltherapy #glutenfree #dairyfree #eattherainbow #rebalancingyou

Amazing roasted aubergine, sweet potato & cashew red Thai curry! Ready in around 40 minutes 20 if you pre roast the aubergine! It's gluten free and vegan and is packed full of flavour! 
#glutenfree #dairyfree #plantbased #plantpower #meatfreemeals #fakeaway #quickfixrecipes #vegansupper #redthai #roastedaubergine #currynights #rebalancingyou #nutritionaltherapy #fiveaday

I saw this picture and thought how true it is! However, I also thought how difficult it is to tune into how hungry you really are ü§î

It's especially hard for alot of us at the moment. We are all stuck inside (which is necessary) but emotions and anxiety are probably a little higher than normal. None of us quite know what is going to happen next and that can be unsettling üòï

Mindful Eating is a technique that can be used to help gain control of your eating and help you cope with your emotions. It's a way of paying attention to your actions and experiences before, during and after eating food ‚ö†Ô∏è Mindful Eating Tips:
üîπSpend a moment or two to think about each meal or snack before you eat. Take a few deep breaths and visualise the food.
üîπTake your time, chew each mouthful thoroughly. Really appreciating the taste and texture of each bite.
üîπTry to eat with others at set times and at set places ie. a table or breakfast bar.
üîπStop when you are full. This isn't as easy as it sounds but taking the time to notice how you feel throughout your meal will help you better understand your bodies cues.
üîπEnjoy your food and try to eat healthful foods most of the time. 
#mindfulness #mindfuleating #mindfuleatingtips #selflove #selfcare #hungercues #nutritionaltherapy #healthylifestyle #personalisednutrition #rebalancingyou

This is one of my favourite things to eat! In my opinion you are never too old for dippy eggs!! Perfect for breakfast, brunch, lunch or a light speedy supper.  An absolute must is yeast extract on the toast!! Thank you @meridianfoods for making it gluten-free! 
#dippyeggs #brunch #glutenfreeeats #glutenfree  #asparagus #boiledeggs #boiledeggsandsoldiers #rebalancingyou #healthychoices #nutritionaltherapy #brainfood #breakfast #yeastextract

Salad and pimped up shop bought houmous for my study break lunch! ü•ó
Thank you @ion_nutrition for facilitating an engaging lecture with @katedelmarmorgan on child health. So interesting! Who knew that there was a special Bristol Stool Chart especially for children üòéüí© #guthealth
#microbiome #glutenfree #dairyfree #houmous #plantpowered #plantbased #fiveaday #eattherainbow #5aday #nutritionaltherapy #nutrition #studybreak #rebalancingyou

The Weekend Bake. I love to bake and this weekends offering is something a little different! Cardamom, Pear & Walnut Muffins. Very tasty and super filling due to the ground almonds and quinoa flour. 
#glutenfree #dairyfree #homemade #weekendvibes #theweekendbaker #walnuts #alternativegrains #healthylifestyle #rebalancingyou #nutrition #nutritionaltherapy

Ok so we've all seen a plate of oranges before, but oh they were good! Lovely and refreshing after lunch, packed full of vitamins A & C and have a decent amount of calcium, especially important if you are dairy free.
üçäüçäüçä
#glutenfree #dairyfree #naturesmedicine #naturessweets #oranges #5aday #fiveaday #plantpowered #plantbased #eattherainbow #rebalancingyou

Today I finally got to make the Banana, Oat & Cinnamon Breakfast Cakes!! ‚ù§Ô∏è Thank you @nicolamoorenutrition for the inspiration.
I made a big fat one rather than small ones and added some blueberries. Served with coconut yogurt, a quick berry compote and some fresh fruit! Delicious and super filling! 
#glutenfree #dairyfree #plantbased #plantpowered #breakfast #breakfastideas #fiveaday #eattherainbow #antioxidants #oats #healthylifestyle #rebalancingyou

Quick study break food today! A delicious salad ü•ó of mixed leaves, grated courgette, beetroot, tomatoes, cucumber, a couple of boiled eggs and lots of dill. Enjoyed in the sunshine ‚òÄÔ∏èin my garden! #glutenfree #dairyfree #plantbased #salad #eattherainbow #fiveaday #vitamind #sunshine #nutrition #quicklunch #studymotivation #studybreak #rebalancingyou

metadata.siteDescription: ENERGISE, RESTORE, NOURISH. I'm studying with the renowned Institute for Optimum Nutrition and will qualify next year. Until then, this is a place to inspire and share healthful information, tips, tricks and recipes. I hope to energise, restore and nourish your body mind and soul!
